## Formatter type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Formatter<I, T extends Hashable, Q extends Question.Metadata = {}, S = T> = (input: I, rules: Iterable<Rule<I, T, Q, S>>, outcomes: Iterable<Outcome<I, T, Q, S>>) => Future.Maybe<string>;
```
